attributes.action: Force the BBC as a government funded public service broadcaster, to report Rugby league results in equal proportion to Rugby Union in national reports
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC's national coverage of RL is substandard, outside of the heartlands its almost impossible to get any sort of RL coverage through the public broadcaster. Regionally RL coverage is almost non existant outside of the heartlands despite a growning number of teams and participants at all levels of competition

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
